classes.search_input: w-full rounded-full border border-gray-300 px-4 py-2 pl-10 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 bg-gray-50
classes.post_input: w-full border border-gray-200 rounded-full px-4 py-2 focus:outline-blue-500
classes.post_button: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white rounded-full px-4 py-2 font-medium disabled:bg-blue-200
classes.comment_input: flex-1 rounded-full border border-gray-200 px-3 py-1 text-sm
classes.comment_button: px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded-full bg-blue-50 hover:bg-blue-100 font-medium
classes.like_button: like-btn flex items-center gap-1 group hover:text-blue-600
classes.nav_link: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded hover:bg-blue-50
classes.nav_link_active: px-3 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 font-semibold
